snippet.title: PocketWorlds - Explore the cubic worlds
snippet.description:
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=game.azule.cubes

Itch: https://azulegames.itch.io/pocketworlds

Microsoft Store: https://www.microsoft.com/es-mx/p/pocketworlds/9pj4zdstbk63

Amazon AppStore: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B082PWRGB5


Solve the puzzle by exploring and obtaining resources in a cubic world

PocketWorlds is a game in which by exploring small worlds made of cubes and using various tools, objects and resources you have to look for the solution to obtain objectives, there is only one solution to solve the levels and to achieve it you have to make use of your skills and ingenuity, look for the puzzle solution and explore 80 levels in different types of world with fun mechanics.
